faqs.question: Welcome! How do I get started?
faqs.answer: Welcome to PCC389! Check this FAQ first, then submit questions if needed.

faqs.question: Plumbing emergency?
faqs.answer: Contact building maintenance at 905-566-1269 for urgent issues.

faqs.question: How to access fitness center?
faqs.answer: Use your resident keycard 24/7. Clean equipment after use.
